thread.title: The Vineyard, On The Lands Of The Abbey.
thread.title_full: The Vineyard, On The Lands Of The Abbey.

title: The Vineyard, On The Lands Of The Abbey.
text: Business Summary The vineyard, on the lands of the Abbey of Le Thoronet (Provence). The total area of the land plot of 93 hectares. Vineyards on the area of 33 hectares. 5 000 olive trees grow on an area of 21 hectares. The house last belonged to the Abbey, the wine cellar dated to the 12th century. The house has 7 bedrooms. VIP house, 140 square meters, 1 duplex. 1 studio. Commercial premises. 3 wine cellars; 1 warehouse. Thoronet Cistercian Abbey in France, in Provence, located between the towns of Draguignan and Brignoles. The monument of Romanesque architecture of XII century. The monasteries of the Thoronet, silvacane and Stank the three most famous Cistercian Abbey of Provence. The cost of the vineyard is 13 000 000 euros. Documents ready to deal. Additional information is available upon request. Financials Gross Revenues: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow Type: EBITDA
